metaTitle: Financing partners at your side – MyHome24App
metaDescription: Regional banks, brokers and advisors present their mortgage products directly on MyHome24App. Transparent, digital and personal.
imgAlt: Handshake between banking partner and MyHome24App

meta.title: Mortgage Partners | MyHome24App
meta.description: Work with mortgage partners and find suitable offers faster — transparent, efficient, and future-proof.

hero.title: Mortgage partners by your side
hero.subtitle: Our partner banks and mortgage partners provide attractive terms, fast decisions and personal guidance — tailored to the German real estate market.
hero.note: Note: MyHome24App is not a bank. Requests are for orientation and partner routing (roadmap).

headline: Strong banking partners
description: Work with experienced mortgage partners and speed up the path to the right financing — with clear processes, better matching and transparent communication.

partnerContact.title: Are you a bank, broker, or advisor?
partnerContact.text: Start a cooperation: We display your offers where users actively search for homes — with clear expectations and solid lead context.

trust.title: Fast request
trust.text: Create a non-binding request in minutes.

trust.title: Save time
trust.text: Relevant offers instead of endless comparisons.

features.title: Structured request
features.text: Clear key data so partners can assess quickly.

features.title: Quick pre-check
features.text: Orientation values & plausibility checks for better conversations.

features.title: Better matching
features.text: Goal: routing by region, profile and product (roadmap).

features.title: Personal guidance
features.text: Connect with the right partner — without unnecessary steps.

partnerBenefits.title: Benefits for partners
partnerBenefits.subtitle: Building a professional network — scalable for the coming years.

items.title: Visibility in the right context
items.text: Your offers appear where users actively compare homes.

items.title: Better leads, not just more leads
items.text: Quality over quantity — structured data increases conversion chances.

items.title: Clean processes & compliance
items.text: Clear notices, consents and transparent communication.

items.title: Long-term partnership

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: A clear flow — usable today, expandable tomorrow.

steps.title: Enter data
steps.text: Use the calculator or submit key values directly in the request.

steps.title: Send request
steps.text: We store the request — even without login (userId can be null).

steps.title: Partner matching
steps.text: Once partners are connected, routing & contact happens (roadmap).

banks.title: Banks
banks.text: More visibility with active home seekers — with clean key data.

brokers.text: Be the go-to for complex cases — from first call to closing.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Short & clear — for users and partners.

items.a: No. We provide orientation and support contact initiation. Binding offers come from the bank/partner.

items.q: Who is the contractual party for users?
items.a: Contracts are only between the user and the bank/partner — not with MyHome24App.
Goal: partner workflow with matching, status and optional partner dashboard (roadmap).

tip.title: Tip
tip.text: Use the calculator first — then your request will be more precise.
tip.subtext: Roadmap: status tracking & document upload for faster processing.

legal.title: Important legal notes
items: Content is for non-binding orientation and does not constitute financial advice.
MyHome24App does not grant loans and does not issue binding approvals.
Please verify terms directly with your bank/partner.
Regulatory obligations lie with the respective financing providers.

bottomCta.title: Ready for the next step?
bottomCta.text: Start a non-binding request or try the calculator — and if you’re a partner, let’s talk cooperation.

howItWorksSubtitle: A clear process — like major platforms. Today: save your request. Tomorrow: automatic partner matching & offers.

directory.title: Partner network (Preview)
directory.subtitle: Your financing network is being built — banks, brokers and specialists. Later: filters, regions, ratings and smart matching.
directory.footerText: Are you a bank or broker and want to join?

title: Financing partners at your side
featuresTitle: What you can expect as a partner
tipText: We are planning a dedicated partner section where trustworthy providers can present their financing products in a transparent way.
tipSubtext: Use the contact form to send us some first information about your institution or company. We will get back to you with further details.
legalItems: MyHome24App does not currently provide its own loans but offers non-binding orientation only.
For binding information on conditions and approval, please contact your bank or financing broker directly.
The results of the mortgage calculator do not replace individual legal, tax or financial advice.
Cooperations are only entered into with regulated and trustworthy financial service providers.
